name: Holland Cream (White Cream Filling)
author: Anonymous
summary: This is the white cream filling used in Smear Faces, Cream Horns, etc. I have looked forever for the Holland cream recipe for donuts. I have never had any luck. I have worked on this recipe for a long time. I use this in my donuts at my cake shop.
directions: In a saucepan over medium heat, stir the white sugar and water until the sugar has dissolved and the mixture is boiling
Remove from heat, and let cool completely
Pour the syrup into a large mixing bowl, and beat in vegetable oil, shortening, and clear vanilla extract with an electric mixer on high speed to blend
Beat in the confectioners' sugar, 1 cup at a time, until the filling is thick and fluffy
If it's too thick, beat in a tablespoon of water at a time until it's the correct consistency
